item.title: 【Music Videos】Alan Walker x Benjamin Ingrosso - Man On The Moon [4K HEVC 10-bit | PCM 24-bit]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic, Pop
Style: Dance-pop
Year: 2021
Video Source: Apple Music, thanks Brungor
Audio Source: Qobuz, Hi-Res 24-bit

"Man On The Moon" is a song produced by British-Norwegian record producer and DJ Alan Walker incorporating vocals provided by Swedish singer-songwriter Benjamin Ingrosso. It's the second track on World Of Walker, released on 26 November 2021 and spent 80 weeks on the charts.

The music video of "Man On The Moon" is directed by Mads Neset and has reached 18.7M total views and 253.3K likes on YouTube (June 2023).

Release Info
The video track is downloaded from Apple Music by Brungor, left as is (2160p HEVC 10-bit).
The PCM track is lossless (Qobuz, HiRes 24-bit), edited and synced with Adobe Audition.
The timed lyrics are synced and edited to match the music video.
Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.
